TopicTitle: Come up with a cool and unique super power, get a side effect: The second one!

Articles.Content:
[if this has been done before please notify me so I can say it's a sequel]

How to play:

Give a side effect to the last person, say your superpower, next person repeats.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

example:

Person A: I want the ability to like milk and everybody to be ok with it.

person B: The milk is always spoiled - I want to be able to be able to control ants.

Person C: You smell like dirt - I want to fly

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Rules;

-power must be original, pls don't just use super speed or something like thst

- Side effect must be original, pls don't just go like "You get cancer lol"

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Try to be funny, I want funny power and stuff.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I'll start:

I want the ability to summon ketchup on the forehead of anyone I want.
